title: `else:false` branch can be desugared
description: `if: S, else:false` collapses to just `S` (since the schema is valid only when `S` is true).

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: else:false can be simplified
comprehensiveExamples.description: `if: S, else:false` is equivalent to just enforcing S.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Use if/then instead of else:false
comprehensiveExamples.description: Prefer if/then or a positive schema when possible.

message: Replace `else:false` with its equivalent positive schema.
